description: This scholarship was established in 1996 to provide scholarship assistance to the incoming freshmen students within the University of Central Oklahoma's Department of Art. Recipient must display a high level of artistry in their area of study. Eligibility Art major Incoming freshman Cumulative GPA 3.0+ Enrolled in 6+ hours of art coursework Requirements Personal artist statement (250 words) Official transcript

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
